One of the greatest war films in my personal collection. Absolutely an all time classic portrayin a great, yet at times harsh and misunderstood, general that helped to lead the Allied forces into a victory over the Nazi forces across Africa, Italy, France, and all the way to Berlin.

I would recommend this film to anyone who has any interest in World War II or American/German/Russian/African/Italian/English history, let alone history of our war, or this world.

This is an all times classic that everyone should have in their collection.
